channel.title: 1st International Workshop on Advanced Neuro-Symbolic Applications on ANSyA
channel.description: Recent content in 1st International Workshop on Advanced Neuro-Symbolic Applications on ANSyA

item.title: Accepted Papers
item.description:
1. Florin Leon. “A Survey of Brain-Inspired Mechanisms for Neuro-Symbolic Reasoning”

  2. Kislay Raj and Alessandra Mileo. “Neurosymbolic AI for GNN Explainability: A Survey”

  3. Darian Onchis and Eduard Hogea. “Logic Meets Attention: A Neuro-symbolic Approach to Vibration Fault Detection”

item.title: Attend
item.description:
Important Note

For each accepted paper, at least one author is required to register and attend the workshop in-person to present their paper on-site. No-show paper will imply no publication of the paper on the workshop proceedings.

Venue and registration

The ECAI 2025 conference will be held in Bologna, Italy. The participants are invited to refer to the ECAI 2025 website for further information regarding the venue, accomodation, or any travel matter.
